extendedInfo.description: EatDrinkPlay BETA v 1.0. Thank you for checking us out!Eat , Drink, and Play in Traverse City, MITraverse City has acquired quite an award-winning reputation for its restaurants, wineries, breweries, and local attractions.At Eat Drink Play TC you can find a simple yet complete list of ALL the restaurants, places to grab a drink, and all of the fun things to do in Traverse City. Locals and visitors now have a Iphone app to help them quickly and easily find all of the food, drinks, and fun that awaits them here in TC.Search by Cuisine/Category, Price, or Location to find what the town has to offer Also, check our blog for activities, pictures, reviews, and more. Thanks for visiting and have fun interacting with the site!This is a BETA version so please email us at troy@dailymedias.com if you find any errors. Thank you for your help!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Helps you find cool bats and restaurants in the area. LOVE IT!
reviews.author: A Google User
